tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I brought my two children (8 and 10 years) for a general check up and a cavity treatment. Little did I know that my children had multiple serious issues ***** * *** *** ************* ****** I feel blessed to have my children get treated by Dr. Sreenita. She is very friendly, ************** experienced and a caring doctor. Children become friends with her right away. Though my children's treatment is still going on, their teeth issues are getting resolved day by day and they got so much healthier now. I trust her expertise and can recommend her 100%! ..which I already did to my family and friends. 
Thank you, Dr. Sreenita, for all your hard work.!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Srineeta is just not a dentist she is more than that, she treats all the patients just like her family members, the patient is just not only a patient for her to make her money rather they motivate them for their good health and gives best suggestions for the welfare of their patients. She gives plenty of time to her patient and be never in hurry. I visited to Dr Srineeta Chowdhury for the intolerable pain in molar teeth of my 5 years old daughter. First I was very scared as my daughter is only 5 but she gave her treatment just like a mother. My daughter is now quite well and now she is a big fan of the doctor due to good behaviour of doctor towards her. Dr Srineeta explains each and everything in detail and never be in hurry. We are fully satisfied with Dr. Srineeta and now we have decided to consider her as our family doctor. She is really a great dentist it is very hard to find a doctor like her. I have also taken my teeth cleaning treatment through her the way of cleaning of teeth was the best no any sensation no any pain. ****** *** ******** ** *** **** ********
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. Appreciate the time spent on writing a detailed feedback. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
UAE Dubai
Doctor Rating (10/10)
My son was suffering badly from teeth related issues. He was very scared and reluctant to go for any kind of tooth treatments. The only option left was to go for treatment along with anaesthesia, which was challenging, time taking and costly. We consulted online Dr Sreenita via Practo app. Dr Sreenita understood our problem very well and she assured for best treatment. She mingled with my son very well. She spent enough time convincing him that the procedure will be painless and smoother. Finally with loads of effort doctor won son‚Äôs confidence and treated him very well without anaesthesia. She addressed all painful areas, doctor brought my son‚Äôs life on track. We stay abroad and we had very limited time, she treated all major issues in very short span of time. We are very thankful to Dr Sreenita for her kind help and perfect treatment.

She in her own natural way start a needful conversation and creates such friendly atmosphere that my child is always looking for to meet with her. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sreenita explained the pictographically explained the entire issue I was facing in relation to my teeth. It was a pleasant change from the other doctors who are generally in a hurry to get to the next patient and fleetingly respond to your queries. 

Another major plus of Smileoracles has been the sensitivity towards the time of the patients and actually sticking to the appointment given. 

I have had a painless experience and I highly recommend Dr. Sreenita and Dr. Siddharth for all your dental woes.
reply_text: Thank u Apporva for the valuable time and feedback :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Surgery,General  Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I have been visiting smile oracles since past 10 years and Dr Siddhartha and Dr Sreeniti has been my constant dentist since then..
I have visited other dentist too but the way they treat is so trust worthy..i have any issue i just give them a call and they treat it as soon as possible..they way they treat their patients, their knowledge, the way they conduct procedures, consultation fees..everything is worth it here..

That is the reason i travel all the way from ghaziabad to get treated by them..
reply_text: Thank u Anshita

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We usually do not go to a Dentist assuming everything to be ok and then one fine day we find a little discomfort in the gums and then it  starts to hurt. This is what happened to me and I rushed to Dr. Sreenita. She examined and found severe plaque deposits which was causing infection and pain in my gums. She then treated my problem and also very patiently explained how important it is to regularly visit a dentist and maintain a good oral hygiene and avoid major teeth problems. Dr. Sreenita is very efficient in her work and also makes her patient very comfortable during the whole procedure.
reply_text: Thank you for the raving review :-)

I had a problem of pain and food lodgement in my lateral incisor.  But dr sreenita not only diagnosed my problem but also told me about my rest of dental issues that can get severe in future. I am so happy with the work of doctors of smileoracle .
Thank you so much dr for making my dental health healthy.
